## Font.Strikeout property

Gets a value indicating whether this [`Font`](../../font) specifies a horizontal line through the font.

```csharp
public bool Strikeout { get; }
```

## Property Value

True if this [`Font`](../../font) has a horizontal line through it; otherwise, false.
